DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy of a pre-pregnancy lifestyle intervention to reduce the recurrence of gestational diabetes mellitus in multiethnic women with overweight or obesity.
DOC.brief_title: Pre-pregnancy Lifestyle Intervention to Prevent the Recurrence of Gestational Diabetes in Overweight and Obese Women
DOC.criteria: Prior diagnosis of gestational diabetes. BMI > 25 kg/m2 Planning to have a baby in the next 13 years English or Spanish speaking Age less than 18 years Women with Type 2 or Type 1 diabetes Current pregnancy Relocating in the next 2 years Medications that affect weight/diabetes Serious current physical disease History of eating disorders History of bariatric surgery Current problems with drug abuse Current treatment of a serious psychological disorder
